Description: About Us:Swim Elite is a thriving company based in Dubai, dedicated to providing exceptional aquatic experiences at home to our clients. We are seeking a passionate and skilled instructor to join our dynamic team. If you have a passion for water, teaching experience, and want to be a part of a company that cares about well-being and safety, we would love to meet you.Join the Swim Elite team as a Home Swimming Coach!Responsibilities:-Deliver personalized home swimming lessons for children and adults-Tailoring lessons to individual needs-Conduct in-home Aquafitness sessions-Be able to travel to clients' homes while adhering to schedules-Guiding clients through dynamic and stimulating exercises-Ensure Pool Surveillance during home events-Ensuring participant safetySkills
Skills: -Have a minimum of 2 years of experience as a swimming coach
-Ability to adapt to clients' specific needs and customize sessions
-Have a valid driver's license and a car
